posts.post_content:
Offering a couple t206 HOFers. The Marquard is downgraded due to ink mark on back but I was told by previuos owner it was in a PSA 5 MK holder. Its that nice. The mark under Lajoie's nose is from the scanner, not on the card or holder. Payment by paypal gift or regular paypal if you absorb the fees.
Lajoie-SOLD
Marquard-SOLD
